//patient future_appointment activity Appointment Day Appointment Time Patient Name Appointment Fee Appointment Number Total Price: %1$s days %2$s hours %3$s minutes %4$s seconds minutes hours seconds
//patient appointment finished activity Payment Successfully Done GO TO MAIN PAGE ANSWER QUESTIONS BEFORE YOUR APPOINTMENT
//patient appointment summary activity Appointment Details Date and Time Time Zone: Chaplain Name Patient Name Appointment Price CONFIRM AND CONTINUE
//Patient Appointment Continue Activity Chaplain Highest Level of Education and Degree Main Language Other languages chaplain can minister in About Chaplain SELECT CHAPLAIN AND CONTINUE Earliest Appointment: CONTINUE Please select a time This Chaplain has no available time right now. Please select another chaplain!

//Patient login page string Patient Login //login page login title textView Email //login page email enter editText Password //login page password enter editText LOG IN //login page login button Forgot Password? //login page login title textView Don\'t have an account yet? //login page do not have an account textView Sign Up //login page sign up textView Admin //login page admin textView Chaplain //login page chaplain textView
//patient main activity NEW APPOINTMENT You do not have any future appointments. You do not have any past appointments.
//patient appointment personal info page Personal Information First Name Last Name Birth Date (dd/MM/yyyy) Sex/Gender Marital Status Occupation Spoken Languages Country of Residency/State CONTINUE
Future Appointments Past Appointments
//patient sign up page strings Patient Sign Up //Sign up page title textView
Name //Sign up page name editText
Surname //Sign up page surname editText
Email //Sign up page email editText
Password //Sign up page password textView

By signing up, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy //Sign up page terms agree textView
Sign Up //Sign up page sign up button
Already have an account? Login //Sign up page go back login textView Your account is not a patient account. You need to enter as a Chaplain //sign up page toast message if user not a patient
Please enter your name //sign up page toast message if name is empty Please enter your surname //sign up page toast message if surname is empty Please enter your email //sign up page toast message if email is empty Please enter your password //sign up page toast message if password is empty Please enter your password again //sign up page toast message if password is empty First and second entered password is not same //sign up page toast message if password is not same Password must be at least 6 character //sign up page toast message if password is not 6 character Please accept terms and conditions! //sign up page toast message if checkbox is not checked Your account created successfully //sign up page toast message if checkbox is not checked
//forgot password activity Forgot Password Please enter your email and weâ€™ll send you a link to reset your password. CONTINUE Sorry, There is a problem. Please try again later! Your email is on the way Check your email noreply@telechaplaincy.com and follow the instructions to reset your password BACK TO LOGIN
//Firestore patient document and collection names patients userProfile profile
//chaplain login Chaplain Login Patient //login page sign in textView Admin //login page sign in textView
//chaplain sign up Chaplain Sing Up OK CANCEL Close SIGN UP Save PROFILE SAVED Addressing Title Credentials Title Chaplaincy Field Faith Affiliation Ethnic Background BACK resume CERTIFICATE Please select a profile image Chaplain Sign Up Form Phone Number Birth Date: Day (birth date) Month (birth date) Year (birth date) Highest level of education and degree Years of experience Chaplaincy Field Faith Affiliation Ethnic Background Preferred Language Other languages you can minister in SSN (for background check) Are you currently Ordained /Endorsed? If yes Ordaining /Endorsing faith group \nand organization name Ordination and Endorsement Period Additional credentials Short Bio Tell the patients about yourself YOU NEED TO ENTER SOME INFO TO USE APP
//chaplain main activity Thank You ENTER YOUR CALENDAR Your application has been send to us. You will be notified when the application is accepted.
//chaplain calendar entry activity Appointment length: 20 min. \nFeedback writing: 10 min. -Early Morning- -Morning- -Afternoon- -Evening- CONFIRM CLOSE Select Available Times
Please enter phone number //sign up page toast message if phone number is empty Please enter day of birth date //sign up page toast message if day of birth date is empty Please enter month of birth date //sign up page toast message if month of birth date is empty Please enter year of birth date //sign up page toast message if year of birth date is empty Please enter your education //sign up page toast message if education is empty Please enter your experience //sign up page toast message if experience is empty Please select a chaplaincy field //sign up page toast message if year of birth date is empty Please select an addressing title //sign up page toast message if addressing title is empty Please select a credentials title //sign up page toast message if credentials title is empty Please enter your preferred language //sign up page toast message if year of birth date is empty Please enter your ssn //sign up page toast message if year of birth date is empty Please select a pdf file again //sign up page toast message if pdf file selection a problem happens. file url is empty Please upload your CV //sign up page toast message if cv is not uploaded Please upload your Certificate //sign up page toast message if cv is not uploaded Your profile info saved successfully //sign up page toast message if chaplin data uploaded to the firestore Sorry, Profile info could not save. Please try again later. //sign up page toast message if chaplin data uploaded to the firestore Your account is not a Chaplain account. You need to enter as a patient //sign up page toast message if user not a chaplain
